thread.title: Pelosi Muses Why Trump Is 'Making Up' Wiretap Claims
thread.title_full: Pelosi Muses Why Trump Is 'Making Up' Wiretap Claims

author: Cortney O'Brien
title: Pelosi Muses Why Trump Is 'Making Up' Wiretap Claims
text:
Pelosi Muses Why Trump Is 'Making Up' Wiretap Claims Share Share Tweet 
House Minority Leader Nancy Pelosi (D-CA) believes President Trump is making up claims that his predecessor ordered the wiretapping of Trump Tower during the 2016 campaign. Why? She believes he is seeking more executive power. He's making this up out of thin air, she mused, because it's something he wishes he could do. 
"Maybe he's projecting that's something he'd like to do," she told the anchors on "CBS This Morning" on Tuesday. Do you think Trump is just making this up? Pelosi: Yes. pic.twitter.com/HTUABtFRJf — Adam Parkhomenko (@AdamParkhomenko) March 7, 2017 
“Once again, the president doesn’t know what he’s talking about because first of all, the president cannot do that,” she said. “That isn’t what President Obama did or could do.” 
The Democrats are not the only ones doubting Trump's wiretap assertion. To the White House's frustration, FBI Director James Comey reportedly told his agency to refute the president's claim. 
The good news is Congress intends to get to the bottom of it. After all, there is a paper trail they can follow, according to Rep. Trey Gowdy (R-SC). 
Pelosi also appeared on CBS to rant against the GOP's new draft to repeal and replace Obamacare, calling it an "extreme" plan that only benefits the wealthy.
